Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

Hi all,

I am having a problem with known bug 1731 (
https://webarchive.jira.com/browse/HER-1731) in Heritrix 3.0.0.

In the comments, Gordon mentioned that it is possible to set the proxy port
value post-build pre-launch via the Scripting Console in the UI.

Does anybody have any idea how to do this?

Thanks a mill,

Shay

--001485f6ceca594855047fa68800
